Articles.Content:
Hi guys.

So far im really enjoying KSP 1.0.2 or whatever its called.

But I have one small issue.

Since one of these latest tiny updates, the heating up of my ships and aircraft is very mild. (too easy)

But the problem is I already started my career. I set the heat Multiplier to 1.0 (because that was ok at the time)

But now with this new update to KSP, the 1.0 heat multiplier is too low.

How can I change it without starting a new career?

PS: I edited my latest save file and I found a line saying something like Heat Multiplier 1

So I changed that to a 1.5

My ships were getting much hotter so I was happy. BUT!!!

as soon as I saved again the heat was back to 1.0 ?!?!?!?!

Its as if only that single save was edited, but all subsequent saves following that were reverted back to the original 1.0

Can someone help my set heat multiplier to 1.5 and make it stick permanently?

Thanks!!!

Check this thread for making re-entry more difficult.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118775-Tweaks-for-a-challenging-re-entry-effect](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118775-Tweaks-for-a-challenging-re-entry-effect)

My personal settings.. everything works for my taste, rockets, sstos and stuff actually blowing up during re-entry. Can tweak those values to suit your needs.
